enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve adding content to an element, with prepend adding content at the start and append adding content at the end.
Both methods take a String as input and involve adding text content to an element.
Calling empty() before prepend() ensures that the element is cleared of any existing content, allowing the prepend operation to start with a clean slate.
Ensuring that child nodes are initialized before prepending content helps in maintaining the correct state of the element.
